-- Noir --

Noir makes her way quickly to the main hatch; Devilcat doesn't 
summon all the Rogues for no stated reason very often. She considers 
replying with a brief comm message, but decides to just go.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Devilcat sends a comm back.  "Hydras, this is Devilcat - we're on 
our 
> way."
> 
> His next signal addresses the Rogues in general.  "All crew, 
report 
> to the main entrance hatch."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> >  Hydras nodded. "Yes indeed you will get to slag something." 
Hydras 
> comm'ed 
> > Quilldart. "I have an idea. Do you still have the sensor 
covers?" 
> Quilldart 
> > looked over and saw them pilled in the corner where he had left 
> them. "Yes 
> > sir, and im glad I make extra." Hydras slapped his hands 
> together. "Alright 
> > heres the plan we each get a sensor disguiser. It will cover us 
> from all 
> > thier sensors. We can leave ommiters in the base sending sensor 
> ghosts of our 
> > numbers. As if preparing for the attack. They wont know weve 
left. 
> At that 
> > point we'll be hiding in the forest and swamps to the south of 
the 
> base. We 
> > can attack them from behind. It may give us a chance! We will 
still 
> be 
> > outnumbers." He sent out a comm to the Rouges. "This is Hydras 
we 
> are in need 
> > of your assistance immediatly, and we will be in debt to you. 
> Please come to 
> > my base immediatly." Quilldart grabbed all the magnet bombs and 
he 
> motiont 
> > for proto and starstorm to grab all the disguisers and headed to 
> the base.
